overview: Major Baranov, a professional with a difficult character, for excessive zeal suspended from service and toiling on small jobs.  Suddenly, he was offered to participate in the operation to expose a dangerous criminal who escaped from prison. And all would be well, but in the case is too many pitfalls: the major will have to go to a small town, get a teacher in kindergarten, and even conduct an investigation under the leadership of a woman…
title: Personal file of Major Baranov
